item.title: Traffic calming measures required, 12th July
item.description:
Constant speeding cars negotiate bend dangerously. Require speed bumps to slow vehicles down before a child gets killed by vehicles speeding around the corner. There has already been crashes in the past

item.title: Waste Bin dumped by a neighbour on pedestrain Pavement, 12th July
item.description:
A neighbour who is fond of fly-tipping all sort of rubbish at this very location was finally caught by the newly installed CCTV which captured him dumping the bin in a broad day light unware that CCTV is now installed. Footage is available to show the offender on request. He resides at 67 Redbourne Drive, Thamesmead, London. SE28 8SG. This is just Waste Bin today placed on pedestrain pavement this time.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Redbourne Drive, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Excess Rubbish in Street from Flats, 12th July
item.description:
This happens on a daily basis, rubbish and stolen goods are left outside on the street. Left right in front of our business premises and the cafe next door. We pay excessive business rates and council tax and yet this keeps on happening. It's Horrendous

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Calvert Avenue, Hackney, London

item.title: Flytipping from new church, 12th July
item.description:
Hi there, A new church has appeared in place of the Kingdom Church on Camberwell Station Road. I believe it’s called Divino. This morning I witnessed two young men - I think of South American origin - dumping rubbish at various points along the road. You’ll see from the images I’ve provided that once they spotted me filming, they then moved the rubbish further down the road. We’ve had well documented problems with the prior Kingdom Church, so it’s very disappointing to see this behaviour already from the new tenants. I have videos if you’d like to see them also. I couldn’t seem to upload on the prior page. Many thanks for your assistance, John

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 93, Camberwell Station Road, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet
